Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Located at one of the busiest squares in Amsterdam. What a laid back scene here. It was a 1-day visit for us in the city and after visiting the Van Gogh museum, we settle down here for a couple of beer. We ordered Belgian beer and chilled …

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Very nice pub in the middle of Leidseplein, good food and lots of special beers. Friendly, cozy, I've been warmly welcomed by the crew. You can find here a selection of trappist dutch beers by La Trappe, one of the only trappist beer not coming from Belgium. Jonathan was super nice!

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Mokum is one of the coolest and most entertaining club/pub in the city. It's a bit narrow but use the advantage of it ;) They know how to have fun and feel it to.the customers... …

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Nice terrace with a fireplace, where you can hide from the rain. Located near Apple Store - ideal spot to spend you waiting time :) Salad with goat cheese is damn delicious, same as Queen burger. Still, not that easy to get waiters’ attention, the service could be better. Also long awaiting time (30-40 min)

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text:
Amazing little cafe. Everything is home made.
Went here while on a weekend trip with my partner and it may be the highlight of my trip. …

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text:
Rude costumer service ruins an otherwise cosy place with an extensive card.
The man taking the orders was extremely rude when asked questions. Forget a smile, he would not even utter a word; simply took our money, gave the drinks and looked at the next customer.

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Cozy & wonderful restaurant with delicious food, cold refreshing drinks & friendly servers!  Casual outdoor seating...  Highly Recommend!

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Great environment and drinks and there was even a cat! But our waitress left and never told us or had anyone else take care of us. And when I asked a simple question about the menu the manager was very rude and unfriendly. The cat, beer and environment are the only reasons I’m give this 3 stars.

Name: Caf√© Mokum

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: The quality of the food is alright, the service is quick and outside there are heating lamps to keep you warm. I would rate this a 4/5

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: The snack platterns and the nacho's were great, the drinks were quite expensive. Café mokum is a place usually filled young people!

Name: Caf√© Mokum
Review Text: Nice place for an afternoon or evening drink, the mojitos are very good and they have a nice beer selection.. The fireplaces and lounge furnitures outside, make for a cozy atmosphere.
